ygData.subject: Re: Borxx Lens
ygData.msgSnippet: Did you read my msg right? That is what i said.. the borxx lens is FOR the observer staff... but the telescope lens are NOT+ACE- Or was that post not directed
ygData.messageBody:
Did you read my msg right? That is what i said.. the borxx lens is FOR the observer staff... but the telescope lens' are NOT+ACE- Or was that post not directed towards me?

Wes Lobdell,
Quote: +ACI-The certain proof that intelligent life exists elsewhere in the universe
is that no one has bothered to make contact with us.+ACI-

-----Original Message-----
From: beatles901+AEA-sxpress.com beatles901+AEA-sxpress.com
To: EQ+AF8-Tinkering+AEA-onelist.com EQ+AF8-Tinkering+AEA-onelist.com
Date: Saturday, July 24, 1999 7:14 PM
Subject: Re: +AFs-EQ+AF8-Tinkering+AF0- Borxx Lens


From: beatles901+AEA-sxpress.com

I can't exemplify how wrong you are. I have gotten many Staffs of the
Observers for myself and guildmates using the lens that BORXX dropped. IT IS
THE LENS FOR THE QUEST+ACEAIQAh- geez+ACE- No arguments, it's over, you're wrong if you
think it is not.


-----Original Message-----
From: dlobdell dlobdell+AEA-stny.lrun.com
To: EQ+AF8-Tinkering+AEA-onelist.com EQ+AF8-Tinkering+AEA-onelist.com
Date: Saturday, July 24, 1999 12:52 PM
Subject: Re: +AFs-EQ+AF8-Tinkering+AF0- Lets find Bidl Frugin


+AD4AKw-ACY-gt+-ADs-From: +-ACY-quot+-ADs-dlobdell+-ACY-quot+-ADs-
+AD4AKw-ACY-lt+-ADs-dlobdell+-AEA-stny.lrun.com+-ACY-gt+-ADsAPA-BR+-AD4-
+AD4AKw-ACY-gt+-ADsAPA-BR+-AD4- +-ACY-gt+-ADs-The lens that Borxx drops is a
+AD4AKw-ACY-quot+-ADs-evil eye lens+-ACY-quot+-ADs- it has one charge of sight or
something like that.. one of those spells that zooms your vision in cant
remember exacly. It has NOTHING to do with the telescope lens quest, hence
the difference- Evil eye lens VS. Telescope lens... And a note on someone
elses post: the telescope quest does NOT give the observer staff when
completed.. that is without a doubt factual information+-ACE- The only quest
that is rewarded with the observer staff is the Borxx quest given by the
female enchanter way out behind the windmills in one of the houses. And yet
another side note: on my server the observer staff is and has been bugged
for some time... it is supposed to have 50 charges of Sentinal, which it
does when first recieved but after you log and come back on, it is reduced
to one charge. I was told not to use the charge and that it will be fixed,
but that was over a month ago. :)+-ADw-BR+-AD4- +-ACY-gt+-ADs-Wes
Lobdell,+-ADw-BR+-AD4- +-ACY-gt+-ADs-Quote: +-ACY-quot+-ADs-The certain proof that
intelligent life exists elsewhere in the universe +-ADw-BR+-AD4-
+AD4AKw-ACY-gt+-ADs-is that no one has bothered to make contact with
us.+-ACY-quot+-ADsAPA-BR+-AD4- +-ACY-gt+-ADsAPA-BR+-AD4- +-ACY-gt+-ADs------Original
Message-----+-ADw-BR+-AD4- +-ACY-gt+-ADs-From: Nosferatu
+AD4AKw-ACY-lt+-ADs-nosferatu+-AEA-mn.mediaone.net+-ACY-gt+-ADsAPA-BR+-AD4-

Borxx's lens is one of them, you re supposed to get one+-ADw-BR+-AD4-
+AD4AKw-ACY-gt+-ADsAJg-gt+-ADsAJg-quot+-ADs-free+-ACY-quot+-ADs- (the one in LF I
believe) than one is one the gnome taken+-ADw-BR+-AD4-
+AD4AKw-ACY-gt+-ADsAJg-gt+-ADs-prisoner by Minotaurs, and one was stolen by a dark
elf, and the only+-ADw-BR+-AD4- +-ACY-gt+-ADsAJg-gt+-ADs-other lens I have heard
about is the Borxx lens (at least this is what+-ADw-BR+-AD4-
+AD4AKw-ACY-gt+-ADsAJg-gt+-ADs-they respond when asked about spare
lens's)+-ADw-BR+-AD4- +-ACY-gt+-ADsAJg-gt+-ADs- Maybe I missed one, if so please
tell me which one.+-ADw-BR+-AD4-
+AD4AKw-ACY-gt+-ADs-+-ACY-gt+-ADs-/Nosferatu+-ADw-BR+-AD4-
+AD4AKw-ACY-gt+-ADsAJg-gt+-ADsAPA-BR+-AD4- +-ACY-gt+-ADsAJg-gt+-ADs-mstokes

+AD4AKw-ACY-gt+-ADsAJg-gt+-ADsAJg-gt+-ADs- From: mstokes
+AD4AKw-ACY-lt+-ADs-mstokes+-AEA-tddny.fujitsu.com+-ACY-gt+-ADsAPA-BR+-AD4-
+AD4AKw-ACY-gt+-ADsAJg-gt+-ADsAJg-gt+-ADs- +-ADw-BR+-AD4-
+AD4AKw-ACY-gt+-ADsAJg-gt+-ADsAJg-gt+-ADs- While I agree that Verant is sick
+AD4AKw-ACY-amp+-ADs- twisted, you are confusing two quests.+-ACY-nbsp+-ADs- The
Evil+-ADw-BR+-AD4- +-ACY-gt+-ADsAJg-gt+-ADsAJg-gt+-ADs- Eye is part of the
Observer Staff Quest and originates at an Observitory.+-ACY-nbsp+-ADs-
The+-ADw-BR+-AD4- +-ACY-gt+-ADsAJg-gt+-ADsAJg-gt+-ADs- Telescope Lens Quest
orignates in the Wizards? Guild and it requires you to get four+-ADw-BR+-AD4-
+AD4AKw-ACY-gt+-ADsAJg-gt+-ADsAJg-gt+-ADs- lenses.+-ACY-nbsp+-ADs- None of them are on
Borxx.+-ACY-nbsp+-ADs- Two are given to you by the
observitories.+-ACY-nbsp+-ADs- One+-ADw-BR+-AD4-
+AD4AKw-ACY-gt+-ADsAJg-gt+-ADsAJg-gt+-ADs- is obtained by killing a 14ish (and nasty)
DE in Freeport, and the last is on this+-ADw-BR+-AD4-
+AD4AKw-ACY-gt+-ADsAJg-gt+-ADsAJg-gt+-ADs- missing gnome.+-ACY-nbsp+-ADs- Please also
note that this quest will not be given to wizards above+-ADw-BR+-AD4-
+AD4AKw-ACY-gt+-ADsAJg-gt+-ADsAJg-gt+-ADs- level 12.+-ADw-BR+-AD4-
+AD4AKw-ACY-gt+-ADsAJg-gt+-ADsAJg-gt+-ADs- +-ADw-BR+-AD4-
+AD4AKw-ACY-gt+-ADsAJg-gt+-ADsAJg-gt+-ADs- +-ACY-gt+-ADs- Believe it , verant has this
sick and twisted thing about making quests+-ADw-BR+-AD4-
+AD4AKw-ACY-gt+-ADsAJg-gt+-ADsAJg-gt+-ADs- +-ACY-gt+-ADs- ungettable at higher levels,
and impossible for low levels to actually+-ADw-BR+-AD4-
+AD4AKw-ACY-gt+-ADsAJg-gt+-ADsAJg-gt+-ADs- +-ACY-gt+-ADs- solve, for instance this
quest. one of the lens you need tog et from+-ADw-BR+-AD4-
+AD4AKw-ACY-gt+-ADsAJg-gt+-ADsAJg-gt+-ADs- +-ACY-gt+-ADs- Borxx, a level +-ACo-30+-ACo-
Evil Eye. With verants normal sense of rewards well+-ADw-BR+-AD4-
+AD4AKw-ACY-gt+-ADsAJg-gt+-ADsAJg-gt+-ADs- +-ACY-gt+-ADs- get 20 exp pts, a faction
adjustment and a tarnished dagger as reward,+-ADw-BR+-AD4-
+AD4AKw-ACY-gt+-ADsAJg-gt+-ADsAJg-gt+-ADs- +-ACY-gt+-ADs- note this is a step up from
the usual rusty dagger they give us.+-ADw-BR+-AD4-
+AD4AKw-ACY-gt+-ADsAJg-gt+-ADsAJg-gt+-ADs- +-ACY-gt+-ADsAJg-nbsp+-ADs- another example
(again gnome) get tergons spellbook, OK this spawns on+-ADw-BR+-AD4-
+AD4AKw-ACY-gt+-ADsAJg-gt+-ADsAJg-gt+-ADs- +-ACY-gt+-ADs- a level 18 or so mob... your
reward for solving the quest? a level 4+-ADw-BR+-AD4-
